original: intros x m. split. - intros H. unfold sat in *. split; intros. + specialize (H m). destruct H as [_ H]. apply H. exists emp, x. split. * apply env_assoc2. * split. -- apply env_pure. auto. -- apply env_emp. + intros [m1 [m2 [H1 [H2 H3]]]]. apply H. exists m1, m2. split. * apply env_assoc1. auto. * split. -- apply H2. -- apply H3. - intros H. unfold sat in *. split; intros. + specialize (H m). destruct H as [H _]. apply H. exists emp. split. * apply env_emp. * apply env_pure. auto. + intros [m' [H1 H2]]. apply H. exists m'. split. * apply env_emp. * apply H2.
